tool_description: Industrial Data Works (IDW), in partnership with ICS[AP] provides enriched vulnerability intelligence data for ICS community.
name: ICS[AP] APIs
title: ICS[AP] APIs

api_list.name: AdvisoryIds Latest
api_list.description: Get a list of the latest Advisories by Id.

optional_parameters.name: n
optional_parameters.description: Number of advisory Ids to pull back. Can be any integer between 1  and 100.

api_list.name: Advisory Entry by vendor, product
api_list.description: Lookup advisory ids based on vendor and product names.

api_list.name: Product List Entire
api_list.description: List of all products and vendors.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ics-ap-apis.p.rapidapi.com/products"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ics-ap-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Vendors List Entire

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ics-ap-apis.p.rapidapi.com/vendors"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ics-ap-apis.p.rapidapi.com"

api_list.name: Advisory Entry by advisoryId
api_list.description: Get a specific CISA Advisory entry based on the id.

api_list.name: Products by Vendor
api_list.description: Gets all products by vendor name.

api_list.name: AdvisoryIds by product
api_list.description: Get a list of CERT Advisory ids for a given product name. Product name must match exactly.
